title: Calories in 10 Blueberries
meta_description: Discover calories in 10 blueberries, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
assumptions: Fresh, raw blueberries; average size (~2 g each, total ~20 g for 10).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 10 fresh blueberries provide about 11 kcal and 2.9 g carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: With 1 tsp whipped cream per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one blueberry?
faqs.a: About 1 kcal per average fresh blueberry.
Yes, 10 blueberries have ~2.9 g carbs, with 0.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: Do blueberries have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligibleâ€”0.1 g protein and 0.1 g fat in 10 blueberries.

faqs.q: Calories in frozen vs fresh blueberries?
faqs.a: Similar, around 11 kcal for 10 frozen (no additives).
